other_title: 雨色ココアシリーズ『あめこん!!』 (Japanese)
plot: Rainy Cocoa's Hawaiian coffee shop is now struggling, so the owner Amami brings back a Shiba Inu named Nana to be their mascot. It turns out Nana has the special ability to sniff out good coffee.
opening_theme: "Aratanaru Makuake no Tame no Makuake ni yoru Kyoushikyoku ~Kimi ga Ireba Oretachi mo Egao Mugendai~ (新たなる幕開けのための幕開けによる狂詩曲～キミがいればオレたちも笑顔∞（無限大）～)" by Fudanjuku
